As at 31 December 2020
There are no uncollateralized investments on Pension and other Post - Employement Benefit Plans as at 31 December 
2020. However, during 2019, there were uncollateralized investments worth of Rs. 561.39 Mn under Pension, Widows’ 
and Orphans’ fund, Widowers’ and Orphans’ fund, Gratuity and Medical Benefit Scheme fund for which 100% provision 
has been made and thus not included in the value of plan assets.
